trends: There have been 417 other sightings in Phoenix
There were no other sightings in Phoenix on or around April 17th 2009
divs: Sighting DetailsAt approximately 12:45 am, I saw a a large fiery green ball streak across the sky in my backyard. It appeared to have crash landed about a mile east of my home. Within 2 minutes, a helicopter with blinking red lights and one solid blue light appeared and began circling an area of about one square mile east of my home and continued to hold this pattern for at least 30 minutes. I drove my car toward the area where the crash could have occurred, all the while watching the helicopter continue on it's path, but there were no signs of a crash, fire, or emergency services response. As I write this, it is 1:30 am and the helicopter is still circling in the same pattern, without a searchlight on I might add.
Object Shape: Bullet, Missile, Circle, Fireball, Sphere, Star-like
